Text: is Mike Wolfes son He graduates this semester from Texas Tech and is moving back here to help his father since his mother passed away a few months ago Kevin says he is a good kid and very smart Could you give it Ashley or someone else at Enron Thanks Jerrsumdoc Jerrsumdoc

FW one morePST Original Message From Young Margi Sent Tuesday January PM To Love Dianne Subject one more Here is one more I came across today Large healthcare facility needs your managed care experience Bachelors degree in accounting finance or healthcare administration is required and CPA or MBA is preferred Ideal candidate will have a minimum years experience with healthcare analysis in addition to TSI experience and the ability to interpret managed care contract terms Direct hire Salary range K Respond by calling or email resume to

FW jobsPST Original Message From Young Margi Sent Tuesday January AM To Love Dianne Cc Decker Phillip Subject jobs I have been entering jobs into the system here in Career Counseling and found a couple that may interest your students If you dont want me to send these in the future maybe you already get these postings please let me know Hope everything in HADM is running smooth Take care HCA Houston TX Corporate has an opportunity available for an Accounting professional in Houston TX HCA is currently seeking a Director of Decision Support Systems for the Gulf Coast Division This position will support HCAs Gulf Coast Operation which is comprised of hospitals located in Houston Corpus Christi and the Rio Grande Valley Qualified candidates will possess a minimum of years accounting experience with an emphasis in cost accounting and clinincalfinancial analysis and a strong knowledge of managed care contracting A Bachelors degree in Accounting or related field is required a CPA is a plus Proven ability to lead people and processes is desired This position found at houstonjobcentralcom job ID DirectorDecisionSupport For more information please see this web site Human Resources Director position Mainland Medical Center located in Texas City TX This position requires planning and direction of Human Resource activities to include hospital wide Education and Employee Health We are seeking an individual with years progressive and legal issues exceptional people and organizational skills Qualified candidates will be multitaskers and handson manager Requires BS degree with current knowledge of labor laws and regulations Masters degree andor PHRSPHR preferred This position found at houstonjobcentralcom web site job ID mmcHRDirector For more information please see this web site
PST ASCGroup a privately held Ambulatory Surgery CenterSurgical Hospital Company has two marketingdevelopment positions available in their corporate offices in Kansas City Kansas Email resume to

FW Ask Phillip about Bob Schultz at EnronPST Original Message From George Alexander mailto Sent Sunday January AM To Love Dianne Cc Diane Alexander Subject Ask Phillip about Bob Schultz at Enron Importance High TLD This is someone Diane knows and have recently reinitiated contact Diane needs to know what he does and responsibilities before a facetoface If he is an officer and ANICO is suing all players in sight she needs to know We checked Edgar for him and he didnt come up in any of the filings Let Diane know at her work email or by phone Thanks Diane and George

FW CEO Job Opportunity for Memorial Hospital in Siloam Springs Arkansas BedsOriginal Message From Rhonda uorumHealthResourcescom mailtoRhonda uorumHealthResourcescom Sent Monday December PM To Cc Larry uorumHealthResourcescom Steve uorumHealthResourcescom Subject CEO Job Opportunity for Memorial Hospital in Siloam Springs Arkansas Beds Attached is a Quorum job opportunity for CEO with Memorial Hospital in Siloam Springs Arkansas Beds I have attached the opportunity in two different formats You may use the one appropriate for your software If you have any difficulty opening these files please let me know Thank you See attached file Joceomhdoc See attached file Joceomhwpd Joceomhdoc Joceomhwpd

FW New OpportunitiesOriginal Message From Judy Byers mailto Sent Wednesday December AM To Love Dianne Subject New Opportunities Dianne Hope you are ready for the rapidly approaching holidays Need to share new opportunities with you in the event you know of individuals who might be interested I will of course be reviewing existing resumes for possible candidates but need to make you aware of other opening that have just become available We had two resignations last week opening up the need to recruit for the following positions Vice President of Clinical Operations Requires someone with a rather specialized background on the clinical side Director of Business Operations Works with startups and existing centers implementing and problem solving within the business office Projected growth has created the need for Development Coordinator Coordinates and works with all phases of a new center to bring it from inception to opening All three of these positions will be based in Kansas City And of course we are still actively recruiting for an Administrator and Group Vice President for the Texas market Have a wonderful holiday And as always thanks for your efforts on our behalf Best Wishes Judy Byers Director Human Resources ASC Group

FW TerroristsOriginal Message From Denise James mailto Sent Monday November AM To Love Dianne Subject FW Terrorists Subject Ollie North You know its funny I remember very vividly the Oliver North hearings but did not recall the name of Osama bin Laden as the terrorist that North was threatened by Has this slimeball been around that long Its pretty evident in hindsight that we should have listened to Ollie I was at a UNC lecture the other day where they played a video of Oliver North testifying at theIranContra hearings during the Reagan administration There was Colonel North in front of God and Country getting the third degree But what he said a stunner He was being grilled by some senator who asked him Did you not recently spend close to for a home security system Oliver replied Yes I did sir The senator continued trying to get a laugh out of the audience Isnt this just a little excessive No sir continued Oliver No And why not Because the lives of my family and I were threatened Threatened By who By a terrorist sir Terrorist What terrorist could possibly scare you that much His name is Osama bin Laden At this point the senator tried to repeat the name but couldnt pronounce it which most people back then probably couldnt A couple of people laughed at the attempt Then the senator continued Why are you so afraid of this man Because sir he is the most evil person alive that I know of And what do you recommend we do about him If it were up to me Id recommend an assassin team be formed to eliminate him and his men from the face of the earth The senator disagreed with this approach and that was all they showed of the clip Its scary when you think years ago the government was aware of Osama bin Laden and his potential threat to the security of the world I guess like all great tyrants they start small but if left untended spread like the virus they truly are

FW FW FW WAR DAMN EAGLEOriginal Message From mailto Sent Monday November PM To Love Dianne Subject Re FW FW WAR DAMN EAGLE MAMA JUST CALLED AND SAID THAT THE DAMAGE WAS WORSE THAN DEPICTED ON TV THE OLD FOOTBALL FIELD THE OLD HOME ECONOMICS BUILDING LOWE AND JAMES ATTORNEY OFFICE THE POST OFFICE WERE ALL BADLY DAMAGED AS WELL MAIL IS BEING MOVED TO THE ARMORY THE HOUSES ON THE STREET BEHIND THE POST OFFICE LOST ROOFS AND WALLS EDNA BLACKWELDERS CARPORT WAS BLOWN OFF MAMA FOUND UNOPENED PACKAGES OF AUTO PARTS FROM DANAS BLDG IN HER YARD OF COURSE THE DOWNTOWN MALL AND THE PIGGLY WIGGLY WERE ALL DESTROYED THE CHURCH TOOK A GOOD LICK DOBBS LUMBER AND BOTH OF THE GAS STATIONS NEAR THE CHURCH ARE GONE MAMMA CAME BACK BY YOUR DADS HOUSE AND SAID IT WAS SPARED SHE SAID THE THE AGENT HAD PUT A REDUCED IN PRICE SIGN ON THE HOUSE MAYBE WITH SO MANY HOMES BEING DESTROYED THE HOUSE WILL SELL SOON AND YOU CAN SETTLE EVERYTHING WITH GLENDA

FWPST Original Message From Growing OBGYN practice in Katy seeks fulltime business manager Two physicians expanding to three in August Duties include personnel managemen currently employees payrollaccounts payable managing profit sharing plan negotiating managed care cotnracts marketing developing implementing and supervising plans to improve collentisons assisting physicians in developing lon term startegic plan developing and monitoring budgets supervising the design and relocation of office facility in new building and recruiting new employees and physicians Position available immediately Contact Judy Owen Medical Center Drive Suite Katy Texas Phone Fax

REPST Thanks Original Message From mailto Sent Monday January AM To Love Dianne Subject RE done You now have shares and cash in your account PL Original Message From Love Dianne ENRON Sent Sunday January PM To Phillip Email Subject The company is Nuerotech Their symbol is NURO They buildingmarket modular hospitals internationally They should be selling at Buy shares or worth I should have the cash in my account from the Enron sale This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

FW Director of Finance PositionPST Original Message From Bob Ellzey mailto Sent Thursday January AM To Cc Subject Director of Finance Position Dianne Please send this out on your jobs hotline Bob Pascasio Administrator for Chambers County Hospital District is looking for a healthcare finance professional to function as Director of FinanceBusiness Office Chambers County Hospital District is located in Anahuac Anahuac is centrally located between Houston and Beaumont and is not a bad commute from either city if moving is not an option Qualifications A hands on individual Ability to be directly responsible for Business Office operations billing collections chargemaster maintenance Financial Statement preparation and presentation Clinic financial management grants management etc Ability to supervise and oversee payroll AP and AR functions At least to years of direct experience in the above functions is preferred Experience in the APS financial information system would be a real plus A Bachelors degree is required A CPA is preferred but will not be required if a candidate has extensive real world operational experience This is a good opportunity for the right person who is looking to expand their CFO experience Please contact Bob Pascasio at if someone you know would be interested in learning more about this position Thanks Bob Ellzey

FW Rachael Rajanayakams ResumeRachael just got laid off at Deloitte due to cutbacks She is outstanding Thought Scott might could use some help and that you might could use Original Message From Wong Olga Sent Monday October PM To Love Dianne Subject Rachael Rajanayakams Resume Olga Please tell Dianne I said thank you for doing this It would be cool working for Enron See ya tomorrow Love Rachael revised resumedoc

FW Accounting PositionPST Please send to people from Enron Original Message From Lewis Paule Anne mailto Sent Monday February PM To Love Dianne Subject Accounting Position Dr Love I am the Director of Finance at Memorial Hermann Southwest Hospital and we are looking to hire an Accountant with years experience The person in this position will initially fill the role of Cash Auditor as we tighten our cash controls throughout the hospital and have the potential to move into a more analytical role The candidate should have experience with cash reconciliation and internal controls enforcement I have attached the job description and would appreciate it if you would circulate Interested candidates should forward resumes to me at Thank you Cash Auditordoc Paule Anne Lewis Director of Finance Memorial Hermann Healthcare System Southwest Hospital Cash Auditordoc

RE Estate Cc PST Just a couple of points that I am not sure I mentioned to you I suggested to Glenda in January after Daddy died that she lease the house with the option to purchase due to the economy in Haleyville She obviouly has not done that The day after Daddy died we went to the bank to get his will to take to Jeffs office for him to read to us Glenda tried to cash in Daddys CD at that point and told them that she was the executrix of his estate They refused because she did not have a death certificate and had not been formally appointed Glenda told me that she had told Dr Cashin that she wanted him to pay off the note on the purchase of Daddys practice immediately Im surprised that he has not since the interest rate on the note is With regard to Jeff Mobley wanted to work something out without going to court I am fine with that However my terms are The money in Daddys checking account saving account and CD are put back in to the estate The estate s Glenda for the forgiveness of the note The value of Daddys truck that she gave away comes out of her distribution The repayment of the that Glenda borrowed from me in April is repaid to me at annual interest from Glendas distribution of the estate If the estate is not settled by the first anniversary of Daddys death that an independent third party is appointed administrator Any excessive administrative fees paid to Glenda for her work as executrix of the estate are repaid to the estate Glenda agrees in writing to discontinue her harressment of me and my family I am willing to give on the forgiveness of the note to Daddy I am willing to allow her to continue as executrix until the anniversary of Daddys death Twelve months is ample time to settle an estate as simple as his I will allow her to keep my grandfathers single shot shotgun that Daddy left to me but that she and her husband stole from my fathers bedroom while he was in the hosptal dying I would even be willing to not make her repay the value of Daddys truck or return the extra that she sold his car for but that she did not put in the estate I mailed the check today Sorry for the delay Ive just been very busy If we are going to file to remove Glenda as executrix Ill need a new one with the correct date of Daddys death to execute Ill be in Auburn from tomorrow night until Sunday Dianne Original Message From Tammy Irons mailto Sent Friday October PM To Love Dianne Subject RE Estate Dianne I have not received any information from Jeff Mobley I have called his office as recent as today The petition for removal is ready to sign but I have got to retain local counsel in Winston County for the purpose of filing as it will be cheaper than having me drive to Winston County Are you familiar with Wyatt Howell or his firm That is the firm I would like to associate Please let me know if this is acceptable to you Tammy Original Message From Love Dianne mailto Sent Monday October PM To Tammy Irons Subject RE Estate Just touching base to see where we are with Daddys estate Original Message From Tammy Irons mailto Sent Tuesday October AM To Love Dianne Subject RE Estate no response I have prepared a petition to have your sister removed I will get it to you for your review prior to filing same Original Message From Love Dianne mailto Sent Tuesday October AM To Tammy Irons Subject RE Estate Just touching base to see if you heard from Jeff Original Message From Tammy Irons mailto Sent Wednesday August AM To Love Dianne Subject RE Estate Legally I cannot contact her since she is represented by an attorney I will follow up with Jeff Original Message From Love Dianne mailto Sent Wednesday August AM To Tammy Irons Subject RE Estate I can also provide you with my sisters contact info if you need it Original Message From Tammy Irons mailto Sent Wednesday August AM To Love Dianne Subject RE Estate I have heard nothing I have been out of town for about days and have just returned today I thought there might be a response from Jeff but none I will follow up Original Message From Love Dianne mailto Sent Tuesday August PM To Tammy Irons Subject RE Estate Tammy Im just touching base to see if you have heard anything from Jeff Original Message From Tammy Irons SMTP Sent Monday July AM To Love Dianne Subject RE Estate Dianne The month period that you are talking about is the claims period for creditors to file a claim against the estate You are not filing a claim against the estate Also you generally have six months to contest the will You are not contesting the will Your only issue is to make certain that all assets of the estate are collected and distributed equally to you and your sister There is no six month time limitation on this I have written twice and have called I will let you know as soon as I hear from him If we have not heard from him in a few days we will take other steps Tammy Original Message From Love Dianne mailto Sent Monday July PM To Tammy Irons Subject RE Estate I checked with the probate judges office in Double Springs and the period ends August Original Message From Tammy Irons SMTP Sent Monday July PM To Love Dianne Subject RE Estate Dr Love Tammy is in DC this week I spoke with her and she advised me that she has still heard nothing from Mr Mobley despite two letters to him She will check with him when she returns Amber Hamner Assistant to Tammy Irons Original Message From Love Dianne mailto Sent Monday July PM To Tammy Irons Subject RE Estate Sent your check today Have you heard anything from Jeff Original Message From Tammy Irons SMTP Sent Thursday July AM To Love Dianne Subject RE Estate no word I will follow up with a phone call to mobley Original Message From Love Dianne mailto Sent Thursday July AM To Tammy Irons Subject RE Estate Just touching base to see if you have heard from Jeff Mobley I think that the six month for the settling of the estate is the th or th of August They filed the first Friday in February Dianne Original Message From Tammy Irons SMTP Sent Thursday July AM To Love Dianne Subject RE Estate I have changed the letter and it will go out today I will let you know as soon as I receive a response Tammy Original Message From Love Dianne mailto Sent Tuesday July PM To Tammy Irons Subject RE Estate Tammy The letter looks good The only changes I have are that my title should be changed from Ms to Dr and my fathers title should be changed from Mr to Dr Thanks Dianne Original Message From Tammy Irons SMTP Sent Tuesday July AM To Love Dianne Subject RE Estate Dianne Attached is a draft of a letter that I thought I would send to Mr Mobley Please let me know if you want me to go ahead and send same I thought we would see what they would disclose assetwise before we approach them with the note or any other omitted asset Tammy File ltrMobleywpd
